shapes3d
Class Box

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.Shape3D
      shapes3d.Box
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class Box
extends Shape3D

A box shape where the length breadth and depth can be set by the user.
Since the visibility, color and texture of each face can be controlled independently so this class ignores the drawMode value.
Note that texture tiling is not supported in this shape.
The centre of rotation is the centre of the box.

Author:
Peter Lager

Constructor Detail

Box

public Box(processing.core.PApplet app)
Creates a cube of size 100. Defaults to different colour for each face.

Parameters:
app - the PApplet to draw this shape

Box

public Box(processing.core.PApplet app,
           processing.core.PVector up,
           processing.core.PVector centreOfRot)
Creates a cube of size 100. Defaults to different colour for each face.
The shape is recalculated so the [0,1,0] axis is now 'up'
The shape's coordinates are translated to make 'centreOfRot' the objects centre of rotation.

Parameters:
app - the PApplet to draw this shape
up -
centreOfRot -

Method Detail

getFaceName

public static java.lang.String getFaceName(int faceNbr)

getRndFace

public static int getRndFace()
Gets the flag of a face chosen at random.
The flag values for each face
FRONT (1)
BACK (2)
LEFT (4)
RIGHT (8)
BOTTOM (16)
TOP (32)
They are powers of 2 so they can be ORed together in any combination.

Returns:
one of the flag values selected at random.
